channel.title: KILLZONE:2 vs Modern-warfare:2
channel.description: Well, it seems that Modern warfare two is "all the rage" and every chump with an x-box plays it for hours on end, rambling on about ranking up in the fictional military. I though that they had every right to do that, and that modern warfare was the best multiplayer shooter out there. That is, until I remembered Killzone 2. I was always a fan of killzone, and played the first, and second completely. I never tried the multiplayer, however. Let me tell you, KILLZONE: 2 Kicks the shit out of Modern Warfare: 2. with both its legs tied to it's hands, while bieng force fed omlets. Take that in for a moment. I tried the multiplayer, and the graphics where astonishing, as where the weapons, ranking system, and gameplay. It Never gets tiring. The only reason, I suppose is the absurd price that PS3's have. Anyway, Killzone 2 is bomb. post your shinanigans here. I'm looking at you, Raminator. [img]https://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8292/794854killzone2helghast.jpg[/img] [img]https://www.onlinemassivelymultiplayer.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/Modern-WarFare-2.jpg[/img]

item.title: KILLZONE:2 vs Modern-warfare:2

item.description:
Both of them suck cock. I don’t see where you are going with this. Bad Company 2 is clearly better.

item.title: KILLZONE:2 vs Modern-warfare:2
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
We’re getting off-topic, aren’t we?

Modern Warfare 2 is more addicting than Killzone 2.

eternalness:

ummm, no. its an intended effect to give a sense of weight because your track sprinter like in MW2, ur a soldier who had gear, armour and pad, weapons, and other stuff to lug with him. KZ2 also has unlimited sprint to make up for the slower movement.

Doesn’t change the fact that it’s shit for gameplay.

Read full topic

item.title: KILLZONE:2 vs Modern-warfare:2
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
Kisuke Moto:

Um, Killzone 2 is not badass at all. What you really shoud be comparing it to is Bad Company 2. Bad Company 2 is the more bad ass game than Modern Warfare 2. Modern Warfare is for pussies and wimps who do nothing but camp. Well sorry to say that my friends, but on BC, you can’t camp on there. No very good anyway and atleast I don’t have to put up with other pussy ass holes running around and knifing everyone you see either. COD was nothing but pussies.

I think the most badass game of all is Bad Company 2

eternalness:

Killzone 2 easily beats MW2, but I have to agree with Jambo about Bad Company 2.

Edit: Why is this in the ladies club? Shouldn’t it be in tech n gaming?

Jambo:

KZ2 MP is pretty sweet, but then Bad Company 2 is better than both of them.

Mr.Shadow:

Killzone indeed fucks CoD in the arse. And I mean the entire series. But BC2 fucks Killzone in the arse.

Its only a page back…kinda hard to miss hahahaha

Read full topic

item.title: KILLZONE:2 vs Modern-warfare:2
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
I’ve never played the KZs, but my friends who own ps3s tell me they overdid the graphics so much that it runs a little glitchy.

Anyway, MW2 is on the computer and KZ2 is not, therefore, undeniably, MW2>KZ2.
